parameters.name: DBTaskGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the SQL task group. You can call the [GetStructSyncJobDetail](~~206160~~) operation to obtain this parameter.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> : To view the ID of the tenant, log on to the Data Management (DMS) console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see [Manage DMS tenants](~~181330~~).
